channel.title: Strategy on TB Pro Invest
channel.description: Recent content in Strategy on TB Pro Invest

item.title: How your psyche affects investment decisions
item.description: A topic that is rarely discussed and not given much importance, yet it is actually very important and extensive and can influence your decision-making, and ultimately whether your investment will be successful or not.

item.title: Index funds or ETF's
item.description: Similar but still different. ETF funds are considered more accessible for entry and exit than traditional index funds.

item.title: Best Investments
item.description: We all invest throughout our lives, but each of us usually focuses on one type of investment or maybe several types.

item.title: Investment control
item.description: Our biggest enemies in investing are ourselves. By controlling and disciplining ourselves, we achieve the greatest financial benefits and financial freedom.

item.title: It is never too early or too late to start investing
item.description: Every beginning is difficult in every business, including the world of finance.

item.title: Keys to investing
item.description: Statistics, risk analysis, technical analysis, and fundamental analysis. Studying movements to predict future trends.

item.title: Personal investments - advantage or danger?
item.description: Diversification in investing is always important, and a good plan with clear goals is necessary.

item.title: Setting financial goals
item.description: If you don’t have clear short-term, medium-term, and long-term goals, you’ll likely spend more and fall into the vicious cycle of debt, particularly credit card debt, which is undoubtedly the most expensive and unfavorable option for you.
